item.title: How To Watch All Animated Hulk Movies In Order
item.description: Hulk appeared in a litany of iconic, and bizarre, animated movies, ranging from thrilling team-ups to adaptations of his most famous comic stories.

item.title: Why The Hobbit's Wargs Look Different Compared To The Lord Of The Rings
item.description: Wargs developed mysteriously across the Peter Jackson movies, looking completely different in The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings trilogies.

item.title: How Tom Hagen Really Died Before The Godfather Part III
item.description: Tom Hagen is one of the Godfather trilogy's most important characters, yet he dies between films. Material outside the movies sheds light on this.

item.title: Justin Baldoni Lawyer Challenges Blake Lively to Live-Stream Testimony in MSG
item.description: Justin Baldoni's lawyer has a challenge for Blake Lively ... he says her testimony should be live-streamed in the world's most famous arena -- Madison...

item.title: President Trump Names Fox News Host Jeanine Pirro as Top Prosecutor in D.C.
item.description: President Trump is going back to the Fox News well for another important position in the federal government ... naming host Jeanine Pirro as the inter...
